title: Exquisite Kundan & Emerald Floral Haaram with Pink Bead Accents
materials: and delicate Pink beads. Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine and luster.
features: This stunning Haaram showcases a contemporary floral design, meticulously handcrafted with Kundan settings. A striking emerald centerpiece adds a touch of regal elegance. The intricate details are complemented by graceful pink bead drops, creating a harmonious blend of tradition and modernity.
colors: accentuated by the rich green of the Emeralds and the soft pink of the beads. This vibrant color palette adds a touch of vibrancy and elegance.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (Vivaha)

and festive celebrations. A statement piece for the modern bride or any woman who appreciates timeless elegance with a contemporary twist. Suitable for half-saree function and other traditional gatherings.
description: A unique blend of traditional Kundan craftsmanship and contemporary design, ensuring a timeless appeal. The high-quality materials and meticulous craftsmanship guarantee durability and lasting beauty. Makes a treasured heirloom, representing both cultural heritage and personal style.
